properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 9:14AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Cahaba River Near Cahaba
Heights...
...The flood warning continues for the Cahaba River at Centreville...
...The flood warning continues for the Cahaba River Near Suttle...
...The flood warning continues for the Cahaba River at Marion
Junction...

.Heavy rainfall of two to four inches is forecast over the Cahaba
River basin during the next 48 hours...and a flood warning remains
in effect along the river.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Cahaba River At Marion Junction.
* from Friday morning until further notice...or until the Warning is
cancelled.
* AT 8:00 AM Monday the stage was 31 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 36 feet.
* Forecast...Rise to 36.6 feet by early Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 36 feet...Flooding is confined mainly to farm and
pasture lands in the area.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Tuesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
